verbs.description: [ARG0: The Associated Press] [V: reports] [ARG1: Secretary of Homeland Security Kirstjen Nielsen is reportedly drafting an executive order to end the Trump administration ’s brutal family - separation policy] .

The Associated Press reports Secretary of Homeland Security Kirstjen Nielsen is reportedly drafting an executive order to [V: end] [ARG1: the Trump administration ’s brutal family - separation policy] .
